resources.string:
Welcome to my Fetch Take Home Application. 

I hope you like the simple application and design. 

Please use the Fetch button below to fetch from the url.

Instructions: 

Fetch Button: fetches the contents from the URL and add them to the EXISTING database. 

Clear Database Button: clears all the rows from the SQL database 

All switch: in On state displays all the rows, in off state displays the fetch query 

Floating ?: Help button, brings you to this page 

All the buttons and switches on the main page will have no effect when the fetch query is being run, they are still interactable. 

The Go Back button on this page will lead you back to the main page, alternatively you can also just press the back button on your device
